control_attributes.Control: AT-3 (4) SUSPICIOUS COMMUNICATIONS AND ANOMALOUS SYSTEM BEHAVIOR
control_attributes.control_description: The organization provides training to its personnel on [Assignment: organization-defined indicators of malicious code] to recognize suspicious communications and anomalous behavior in organizational information systems.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization correlates information from nontechnical sources with audit information to enhance organization-wide situational awareness.

Control Statement: The organization provides training to its personnel on [Assignment: organization-defined indicators of malicious code] to recognize suspicious communications and anomalous behavior in organizational information systems.
Control Name: AT-3 (4) SUSPICIOUS COMMUNICATIONS AND ANOMALOUS SYSTEM BEHAVIOR
